welcome_description: Join Hubsite Social platform where your opinions matter! Earn coins for each completed survey and easily convert them into real money. Enjoy a seamless experience, tailored surveys, and the chance to share your insights while getting rewarded for your time. Start earning today!
hubsite_social_description: Join Hubsite Social platform where your opinions matter! Earn coins for each completed survey and easily convert them into real money. Enjoy a seamless experience, tailored surveys, and the chance to share your insights while getting rewarded for your time. Start earning today!

cards.heading: Sign Up
cards.paragraph: Join our community and discover how your opinion can matter. We’ve paid over 1.2million rupees to our members in the last year alone!

cards.heading: Take Surveys
cards.paragraph: Take a survey and get paid for sharing your feedback on the products and brands we all know and love. It’s a win-win for everyone!

cards.heading: Get Rewarded
cards.paragraph: Get rewarded in virtual points (LPs) that can be redeemed as e-gift cards, PayPal, and much more. You choose how you get rewarded, so you choose how taking surveys benefits you!

footer.address: A-46, Noida, Sector 2, Uttar Pradesh, India

reviews.title: Our Happy Panelists Say About Us

newsletter.title: Sign up to our newsletter
newsletter.description: Receive latest news, updates, and many other news every week.
newsletter.error_message: Please enter a valid email address.
newsletter.success_description: We've received your email for Newsletter Updates.

feature.title: Key Benefits
feature.subtitle: Share Your Insights, Earn Rewards, and Make an Impact
feature.paragraph: Join Hubsite Social to participate in engaging surveys that allow your voice to be heard. Earn exciting rewards while helping businesses understand consumer needs and shape the future of products and services. Your opinions matter—make a difference today!

userFriendlyInterface.title: User-Friendly Interface
userFriendlyInterface.description: Navigate the site with ease thanks to an intuitive design that simplifies the survey participation process.

diverseSurveySelection.title: Diverse Survey Selection
diverseSurveySelection.description: Access a wide array of surveys on various topics, allowing you to engage with content that interests you.

personalizedSurveyInvitations.title: Personalized Survey Invitations
personalizedSurveyInvitations.description: Receive tailored invitations based on your profile and preferences, ensuring relevant and engaging survey opportunities.

rewardSystem.title: Reward System
rewardSystem.description: Earn points and rewards for your participation, including gift cards and exclusive discounts, making your feedback valuable.

realTimeFeedbackImpact.title: Real-Time Feedback Impact
realTimeFeedbackImpact.description: Contribute to market research that helps businesses gain immediate insights, influencing product development and service improvement.

communityEngagement.title: Community Engagement
communityEngagement.description: Join a vibrant online community of like-minded individuals who share their opinions and contribute to meaningful market research.

educationalResources.title: Educational Resources
educationalResources.description: Access valuable insights and reports based on aggregated survey data, helping you stay informed about market trends.

dashboardForAccountManagement.title: Dashboard for Account Management
dashboardForAccountManagement.description: Easily manage your profile, track your survey participation, and monitor your rewards through a comprehensive dashboard.

dataPrivacyAndSecurity.title: Data Privacy and Security
dataPrivacyAndSecurity.description: Experience peace of mind with strong data protection measures that keep your personal information secure and confidential.

supportAndHelpCenter.title: Support and Help Center
supportAndHelpCenter.description: Benefit from a dedicated support section that provides answers to frequently asked questions and assistance with account-related inquiries.

stepTwo.title: Monetary Conversion
stepTwo.description: Users can convert earned coins into actual money, enhancing the perceived value of participating in surveys.

stepOne.title: Targeted Surveys
stepOne.description: Allows for segmentation and targeting of specific demographics to improve survey relevance.

stepThree.title: Increased Participation
stepThree.description: Offering coins as rewards incentivizes users to take surveys, resulting in higher response rates.

stepFour.title: Enhanced Engagement
stepFour.description: The prospect of earning coins encourages regular participation, fostering a habit of providing feedback.

login.title: Login
login.loginContinue: Login to continue to our website

notFound.page_not_found_description: The page you're looking for seems to have gone on an adventure of its own. But don't worry, we'll help you get back on track.
